subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
Franchises
lead_paragraph: As the Knicks and the Nets clear cap space for the 2010-11 season, they are producing the worst combined record in New York’s history in the league.
snippet: As the Knicks and the Nets clear cap space for the 2010-11 season, they are producing the worst combined record in New York’s history in the league.
